00020    SimulationAccess::SimulationAccess(Simulation& simulation)
00021     : 
00022       atomTypes_(),
00023       simulationPtr_(&simulation),
00024       boundaryPtr_(&simulation.boundary_),
00025       atomStoragePtr_(&simulation.atomStorage_),
00026       bondStoragePtr_(&simulation.bondStorage_),
00027       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00028       angleStoragePtr_(&simulation.angleStorage_),
00029       #endif
00030       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00031       dihedralStoragePtr_(&simulation.dihedralStorage_),
00032       #endif
00033       pairPotentialPtr_(simulation.pairPotentialPtr_),
00034       bondPotentialPtr_(simulation.bondPotentialPtr_),
00035       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00036       anglePotentialPtr_(simulation.anglePotentialPtr_),
00037       #endif
00038       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00039       dihedralPotentialPtr_(simulation.dihedralPotentialPtr_),
00040       #endif
00041       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00042       externalPotentialPtr_(simulation.externalPotentialPtr_),
00043       #endif
00044       energyEnsemblePtr_(simulation.energyEnsemblePtr_),
00045       boundaryEnsemblePtr_(simulation.boundaryEnsemblePtr_),
00046       randomPtr_(&simulation.random_),
00047       domainPtr_(&simulation.domain_),
00048       exchangerPtr_(&simulation.exchanger_),
00049       fileMasterPtr_(simulation.fileMasterPtr_),
00050       nAtomType_(simulation.nAtomType_),
00051       nBondType_(simulation.nBondType_),
00052       #ifdef INTER_ANGLE
00053       nAngleType_(simulation.nAngleType_),
00054       #endif
00055       #ifdef INTER_DIHEDRAL
00056       nDihedralType_(simulation.nDihedralType_),
00057       #endif
00058       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00059       hasExternal_(simulation.hasExternal_),
00060       #endif
00061       maskedPairPolicy_(simulation.maskedPairPolicy_),
00062       reverseUpdateFlag_(simulation.reverseUpdateFlag_)
00063    {
00064       atomTypes_.associate(simulation.atomTypes_); 
00065       // RArray atomsTypes_ wraps the same C array as that
00066       // owned by atomTypes_ DArray in the parent Simulation.
00067    }
